component.text:
Private or Public?
Which infrastructure should I use?

Reliability?
Our branch depends on the WAN. Reliability is essential.

QoS?
End-to-end Quality of Service (QoS) may be hard to obtain across the Internet.

Security?
How do we protect ourselves from security threats over the WAN?

Confidentiality?
We need to send sensitive company information to our branches across the WAN.

Latency?
Delays can be a problem for real-time traffic.
